column4: is there something i can do to make programs that run in a terminal only to be listed under applications and when clicked on open a terminal automatically
you can right click and edit menu and then add stuff with "gnome-terminal -e "application" as command
go for gtk2, metacity is window borders but a lot of gtk2 include them
if you get metacity or gtk2 without borders you need to hit customize in the appearance window to find and select them
